question:
Question: Navigation Instruction given at initial position: [take off and turn left and go over the tress towards the drink ice gold. now turn right and go over between the buildings towards the brown building. now turn right and go over the buildings and cross the road towards the ash building. now turn right and get up and go over the buildings towards the ash building terrace. now turn right and turn back and go over the buildings and get down reach the ash building and stay there.]. At the initial position, you are asked to move according to a series of movement instructions. What are you doing now?  
choose:  
A. I turn right, stand up, and walk across the building toward the Gray Building Terrace.  
B. I turn right and go back over the building, down to the Ash Building, and stay there.  
C. I turn left, pass the hair, and go to Drink Ice Gold.  
D. I inspect the building.  
E. I turn right and walk between the buildings toward the Brown Building.

textgrad_result.init_answer: Option: B; Reason: The sequence of images shows the agent has completed the series of movements described in the navigation instructions, including turning right and going back over the buildings to reach and stay at the Ash Building. The final frames depict a stable position over the Ash Building, aligning with the last part of the instruction.
textgrad_result.evaluation:
Location: [(0, 59), (59, 146), (146, 247)]
Option: [B]
Reason: The video shows the agent moving through the environment, eventually reaching a point where it is overlooking a city. The final instruction was to reach the Ash building and stay there. The video ends with the agent in a stable position overlooking the city, which aligns with the instruction to stay at the Ash building. Therefore, the agent has completed the series of movements described in the navigation instructions, including turning right and going back over the buildings to reach and stay at the Ash Building.
textgrad_result.final_answer: Option: B; Reason: The sequence of images shows the agent has completed the series of movements described in the navigation instructions, including turning right and going back over the buildings to reach and stay at the Ash Building. The final frames depict a stable position over the Ash Building, aligning with the last part of the instruction.
